biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers, is a formidable competitor known for his unwavering focus and calculated approach to the game. Representing Hirsala Golf, Jarkko brings a level of strategic depth to every tournament he enters. While he maintains a stoic demeanor on the course, those close to him know him to be a warm and engaging individual.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jarkko's experience is undeniable. His pursuit of excellence has led him to one victory at the Hector Trophée, and a Victor Trophy to boot. Jarkko's dedication and skill make him a player to watch as he continues to make his mark on the sport. The Hector Trophée 2025 will be Jarkko's ninth appearance at the event.
